Content: Former Minister Professor Tissa Witharana says the proposal to exchange Sri Lankan tea for crude oil imported from Iran. Professor Tissa Witharana made a comment at a media briefing held in Colombo. He said that as the U.S has imposed sanctions on Iran, Sri Lanka will be unable to buy crude oil from Iran. Hence, exchanging tea to crude oil is a wise decision. The former Minister praised the decision of the government to solve the problem.
